content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (x=17.5, y=20.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at Position (x=17.5, y=20.5)
- Boiler at Position (x=1.5, y=23.0)
- Offshore Pump at Position (x=-9.5, y=24.5)
- Pipe network connecting the offshore pump to the boiler and steam engine
- Electricity poles forming an electricity network

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without availability
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities like boilers.

### Errors related to fuel shortages
- Regularly check and refuel entities such as boilers to prevent them from running out of fuel and halting operations.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
